sub_title: First year student at The Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences pursuing a Bachelor of Business Administration in International Business.
summary:
First year student The Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences pursuing a Bachelor of Business Administration in International Business. Former Legal Intern at HM Electronics. Former Editor-In-Chief of Classical Academy's Nationally Acclaimed Journalism Program and Yearbook; The Chronicle.

US and Netherlands Citizen

awards.title: National Scholastic Press Association All-American Award with Four Marks of Distinction
awards.description:
“The NSPA is considered to be one of the most prestigious award bodies in high school journalism, comparable to the Pulitzer Prize.

The NSPA scores publications in five areas: Concept & Essentials; Content; Writing and Editing; Photography, Art and Graphics; and Layout. Judges account for differences among literary, feature and specialty magazines and score accordingly. For example, if photography is not included in a literary magazine, the score will not suffer since the artwork and graphics will be evaluated for the score in this section. Marks of Distinction will be given for accomplishments of extraordinary merit.

To receive the highest All-American Award, the magazine must earn at least four Marks of Distinction and 450 points out of a highest point total of 500 points. About five percent of all entries receive the coveted All-American Award.”

awards.title: CSPA Silver Crown Award
awards.description:
"Crown Awards are the highest recognition given by the CSPA to a student print or digital medium for overall excellence."
https://cspa.columbia.edu/recepient-lists/2022-awards-student-work-crown-awards-scholastic-recipients

profile_positions.description:
Intern under HME's General Counsel and Senior Vice President, Mike Garrett. 
Worked on presentation regarding privacy law which was reformatted and updated to comply with the CPRA. Worked on matters regarding Canada's Bill 96, Health Law concerning Roe v. Wade being overturned, Remote Employee Reimbursement Laws, and Contract Law. 
Became familiar with the GDPR, CCPA, CPRA, and several other US states' privacy laws.
Gave presentation to executive team on work done during the internship.
profile_positions.title: Legal Intern

company.name: Classical Academy High School Journalism: The Chronicle

profile_positions.company: Classical Academy High School Journalism: The Chronicle
profile_positions.description:
Created and produced the 16th volume of Classical Academy High School's The Chronicle titled "Like People Do". The Chronicle is a Nationally Acclaimed Yearbook and has won awards including The Pacemaker and a CSPA Silver Crown. 
Worked in theme development, graphic design, photography and writing. Wrote and co-wrote many articles including, The Importance of Literature in Society, Political Polarization, and The Effects of Social Media in an Educational Setting. 
Managed a team of 20+ students who together made up the 2021-2022 Journalism Staff and produced the yearbook.
profile_positions.title: Editor In Chief

profile_positions.company: Classical Academy High School Journalism: The Chronicle
profile_positions.description:
Edited articles and stories for the 15th volume of The Chronicle.
Wrote and edited copy and captions, approved stories, angles and questions for reporters. Managed a small team and created spreads on various topics occurring on campus.
profile_positions.title: Copyeditor

profile_positions.company: Classical Academy High School Journalism: The Chronicle
profile_positions.description:
Worked with a small team to create spreads for the 14th edition of The Chronicle. Wrote articles, designed layouts, and attended events as a photographer. 
Won Student Subject Award.
profile_positions.title: Reporter
